Name: Mr Anthony
Ingredients: 20 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A genever-based Penicillin , combining malty gin and honey with subtle ginger warmth and plenty of Scottish island peaty character.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in February 2014 at Mystique, Amsterdam, Netherlands.
Nutrition: One serving of Mr Anthony contains 155 calories
